attributes.action: ASK UK GOVT TO PROVIDE ALL POLICE DOGS IN THE UK WITH FUNDING FOR KEVLAR VESTS.
attributes.additional_details:
KNIFE CRIME & GUN CRIME HAS INCREASED DRAMATICALLY ALL OVER THE UK. ALREADY PD FINN NEARLY DIED OF HIS SEVERE INJURIES.HE IS JUST ONE AMAZING DOG OUT OF THE MANY WONDERFUL POLICE DOGS IN THE UK,PROTECTING CITIZENS FROM DANGEROUS VIOLENT AND ARMED PERPERTRATORS IN OUR STREETS & NEIGHBOURHOODS.
IF ALL POLICE DOGS HAD KEVLAR STYLE PROTECTION VESTS, THIS WOULD GO A LONG WAY IN PROTECTING THEIR SAFETY,&WELLBEING, AS THEY ARE VERY VALUABLE MEMBERS OF ALL THE POLICE FORCES THROUGHOUT THE UK.
attributes.background: AFTER WHAT HAPPENED TO PD FINN,BCH & THE INTRODUCTION OF  *FINNS LAW* I WOULD LIKE TO SEE THE GOVT PROVIDING EXTRA FUNDING TO ALL POLICE FORCES FOR ALL POLICE DOGS TO HAVE ANTI STAB /ANTIGUNSHOT KEVLAR CANINE VESTS.THE ANIMALS ARE THE FOREFRONT OF POLICING & MUST RECEIVE THE SAME LEVAL OF PROTECTION
